Methods
```{r}
#List of kelp forest fish species 
##sheephead, sea urchin(all), rockfish, cabezon, spiny lobster, giant kelpfish,scorpionfish, giant sea bass, kelp bass
###Filter data to only include these species, and none else
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)


```

Eureka
```{r}
eureka <- read.csv("Table16PUB_2019_ADA.csv")

eureka <- eureka  %>% filter(str_detect(Species, "Rockfish|Sheephead|Sea Urchin|Cabezon|Lobster|Kelpfish|Scorpionfish|Sea Bass|Kelp Bass|Sea Urchin"))

eureka[,c("Species", "Pounds")] <- NULL

eureka <- eureka %>% group_by(County) %>% summarise(Total_Value = sum(Value))





```
